scripts.npm-install: npm i && concurrently "cd express && npm i" "cd react-app && npm i"
scripts.docker: cd docker && docker build -t mysql-blog . && docker run -p 3306:3306 --name mysql-blog -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=password -d mysql-blog
scripts.start-app: concurrently -n react,express -c black.bgCyan,black.bgGreen --kill-others "cd react-app && npm run dev" "cd express && npm run start:nodemon"
